body: It's funny that in the first page, it said not to re-upload especially on nhentai
I think that was the point. by the end they weren't in different bodies so much as they all were in every body, if my following of the story was correct.
body swap is pretty good, but, may it be the TL, keeping up with the dialogue was retarded
Really cute art, but keeping track of the actual story and dialogue was too much of a hassle. I prefer most other TS no F stuff.
They're so cutely drawn! It would have been great even without the body-swap gimmick, tbh.  Wish they'd all just got drunk and did it w/o the sci-fi stuff.

Just a bit confusing when trying to determine who is talking to who exactly in the mists of their confused body swapped situation, being tired while reading doesn't exactly help either... thanks for clarifying, anyways.
@HentaiSoul The guy is the blonde chick, the blonde chick is the black-haired chick and the black-haired chick is the guy. Not that hard to follow.
Anyone actually understand who the fuck is who??
